content: Website: www.cryptosyno.ioDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/cryptosynoTelegram: https://t.me/CryptoSynoTwitter: https://twitter.com/CryptoSyno_CSYNWHY WAS CRYPTOSYNO CREATED?!?CryptoSyno was created out of frustration with poor odds and the lack of transparency from real-world cash casinos. CryptoSyno aims to offer a fair and transparent gaming experience, whether it's meme-coins or utility-based projects you're after.TOKENOMICSBuy1% Sent to burn addressSell1% Reflections2% Sent to burn address2% Sent to slot machine reward poolSLOT MACHINE ODDSHouse odds 0.1% - 10% of the prize pool is sent to the dead address.Big win odds 0.1% - Win 10% of the prize pool.Standard win odds 8% - Win 1% of the prize pool.After three losses in a row, the user is granted a 2x odds increase. Users will keep getting extra odds bonuses for every loss if their losing streak is 3+. After winning any reward, probabilities will reset to normal.VIP STATUS- x1,000 $CSYN token sent to the dead address.- Grants personalized remote concierge service.- Exclusive access to upcoming games.- Exclusive access to upcoming tokens.ROAD MAPMay 4th, 2022New York City Meetup in lower ManhattanMay 25th, 2022Google business profile pageSecurity Audit KYCUnicrypt Presell 8 PM UTCAMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCMay 29th, 2022- Public release of CryptoSyno 8 PM UTC- Fully functional slot machine- Southern California Meetup in Eastvale- AMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCJune 2022- Listed on various indexes, i.e., CMC- Burn event- Â Southern California Meetup in Chino Hills- AMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCJuly 2022- Pursue various exchanges, i.e, Crypto.com- Southern California Meetup in Pasadena- AMA hosted on Discord at 8 PM UTCContinuous- Continue to improve branding, website, dapp- Continue to pursue various exchanges, i.e, Crypto.com- Continue to burn tokens from the total supply
